author: Victoria Brown
title: Najib: It's obvious Kit Siang is Opposition leader - Nation | The Star Online

persons.name: datuk seri dr wan azizah wan ismail

text:
Saturday, 11 February 2017 | MYT 7:26 PM Najib: It's obvious Kit Siang is Opposition leader by victoria brown A debate has started over whether Lim Kit Siang (left) or Dr Mahathir is the de facto Opposition leader. 
PETALING JAYA: Datuk Seri Najib Tun Razak has weighed in on who the de facto Opposition leader is, saying that the position belongs to Lim Kit Siang as he "calls the shots". 
"Lim Kit Siang is Pakatan's de facto leader. DAP should stop trying to hide it," tweeted the Prime Minister on Saturday. 
"Voters know DAP has the most Opposition seats and Lim Kit Siang calls the shots," he said. 
The identity of the de facto Opposition leader had been widely discussed since DAP's newest member Datuk Zaid Ibrahim said on Friday that there was a silent agreement among the Opposition that it was former prime minister Tun Dr Mahathir Mohamad. 
Zaid's statement ruffled feathers within DAP, with its central executive committee member Gobind Singh Deo saying that there was no such understanding. 
Gobing also criticised Zaid for making the announcement as a DAP member without consulting the party leadership. 
Zaid only joined the DAP on Tuesday. 
The Opposition leader is currently Datuk Seri Dr Wan Azizah Wan Ismail, who took over from her husband Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim after he was jailed for sodomy.
